name: Find "Bump" In Comments
description: Designed for Scratch to find the word "bump" within a short comment. This usually means that the comment had the express purpose of being a "bump" comment, so it should be ignored by the messages algorithm.
content: Replace this line with whatever text you want. If it lights up blue, you have enetered a comment that will be marked as a bump.
